alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Butler County through 315 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from 7 miles west of Morgantown to near Dunmor. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Rochester, South Hill, Huntsville, Mining City, Dimple, Aberdeen, Leetown, Davis Crossroads, and Eden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
